website_summaries.verdict: This medical bracelet won't work for everyone, but is worth considering if you are looking for a functional and feminine option.
pros: Has a stylish design that looks like a fashion bracelet, yet can be custom engraved with your medical condition or medication
Comes with a link removing tool
Available in rose or silver tone
cons: Not as versatile as others we considered, as the feminine design and smaller size won't work for most men

customer_reviews.title: Ideal bracelet for medical condition!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bracelet it isn’t cheap looking. Gives me comfort to know if I pass out or something people will know. I have a medical condition!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Husak

customer_reviews.title: Looks Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My wife recently had a minor stroke and I wanted her to wear an ID with a blood thinner warning. It looks more like a nice bracelet than a medical tag. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard R.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bracelet. The other chain style bracelets were constantly getting caught on and ripping or pulling threads out of my clothing; not this one! It’s sleek and fits well. The clasp is nice and stays on well. Sometimes it can be a little difficult to clasp, but I am always able to do it myself. Easy to remove. Slight scratching on it but overall in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amber R. Landis

customer_reviews.title: Can be seen in emergency. Highly visible...
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my wrist. I like that it is stainless steel. The engraving is large and in bold letters, I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Love2Learn

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous bracelet, but tough to remove links
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and sturdy, however removing some of the links was a struggle. I stabbed myself in the finger while in the process with the tool it comes with. Did NOT feel good. Just beware and make sure you have proper tools and/or hand protection if you're not very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: Fit nicely but if someone needs to see alert they will have to take the bracelet off, a little heavy then I like, pulls hair on my arm constantly and causing sores, reason for 3 star the bracelet is pretty only had for a couple of weeks and its easily scratched up looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Hamons

customer_reviews.title: Medical Alert Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ....The only thing I don't like is the info is on the back of the bracelet.....It just scares me that because of the color of the bracelet Medical EMT's...Ect....may pass it by...I did keep it...I did by a silver one with the red medical alert and words on front of bracelet I feel more comfortable wearing that one when I am out alone.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: fastener poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the bracelet and needed it also, but the latch did not work correctly and the bracelet somehow came loose and I lost it. Now I will have to purchase another bracelet because I need one for my medical issue.
customer_reviews.author: sue morton

customer_reviews.title: Great health bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a road trip I was taking to make sure if an accident happened that the first responders would know about a health condition upon treatment. It is a very nice and well made bracelet. I was impressed by the quality too! Printing was visible and nicely done.
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and worth it
customer_reviews.text: This medical id is really pretty and if you didn't see the medical symbol, you would just think it's a pretty bracelet. It was a little big but removing a couple links wasn't terribly difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Goods great.
customer_reviews.text: I really think it’s a great buy. Looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: B- Quality
customer_reviews.text: Had only a few weeks and color is fading from wear and tear. Not as good as my other gold one.
customer_reviews.author: LovinOES

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bracelet
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet arrived on time and actually looks much better than the picture. I gave it to my sister as a gift and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Banks

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice bracelet, looked small but fits perfectly. It came with extra links, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous bracelet!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bracelet for my sister. It's beautiful, looks like a sophisticated bracelet, very pretty. she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: NYmomma

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for a beautiful bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Great look and just what I have been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a little over a week and it already broke. One of the fasteners holding a link together slipped out. Was expecting better quality for the price. VERY disappointed. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Carroll-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get latched and unlatched. Pin holding bracelet together fell out first time I wore it. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, but it broke after wearing it for just a couple of weeks. Would not recommend it. I was really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pathfinder

customer_reviews.title: Cute design
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice design to it but it does scratch easily
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty! I would give 5 stars, but I find it difficult to clasp and unclasp.
customer_reviews.author: Debrah J Usowski

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This was for my wife and she really likes it. It is comfortable and very stylish and serves an important function.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like
customer_reviews.text: The pins kept coming out of the band would not stay together
customer_reviews.author: ssmith

customer_reviews.title: Visible and Fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for a person who is looking for a medical alert bracelet that is visible and fashionable.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, practical
customer_reviews.text: It fits; it is lovely; it seems fine in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Identify Me
customer_reviews.text: My doctor emphasized the importance of identifying my medical restrictions especially when traveling
customer_reviews.author: Faye Betts

customer_reviews.title: This was a necessity
customer_reviews.text: I am now a diabetic at 63. I never thought of wearing a medical bracelet until one day while grocery shopping my blood sugar dropped so low I nearly passed out. I realized then that without a medical ID bracelet if I had passed out it might have taken the paramedics more time than needed to find out what was wrong with me. Now I’m confident that if that were to happen they would immediately know what was wrong and correct the situation must faster. This is a must for anyone with a medical condition. I wear it 24/7 and it still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love it- not too big! Lightweight but not cheap looking!
customer_reviews.author: Steve & Dina

product_meta.title: linnalove Pre Engraving Medical Alert - Stainless Steel Fashion Medical id Bracelet for Women(7.5)
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :September 21, 2018
 * Manufacturer :linnalove
 * ASIN :B07WQFYB8W

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #145,638 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #37 inWomen's ID Bracelets 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.4 out of 5 stars83 ratings
feature_bullets: Surgical grade 316L stainless steel is carefully manufactured, not allergies, anti-corrosion.S-shaped body design to express the beauty of women
Unique shape links designed for women,the central oval medical id tag with a red enamel medical id symbol
Pre-engraving "BLOOD THINNER" on the back of bracelet, black laser engraving, easy to identify!
Size is 7.5 inches, can adapt to most women wrist,You can also self-adjust the length according to our guidebook - need to have hands-on ability!
The bracelet is packaged in a grey velvet bag and white gift box. Very good gifts for women, moms, grandmothers, sisters
